info.name: WSG: Mewtwo Theme
info.description: A Mewtwo themed layout as per request of Typroniter.
info.additionalInfo: August 14th, 2017 - Version 2.1 - Updated the style in accordance to recent layout updates. September 25, 2016 - Version 2.0 - Wiped the style and started from scratch. - Colors tweaked a little bit. - Added clarity compared to the previous version. August 23, 2016 - Release Date - v1 of the style is released.
